localised_text.tooltip_text: There are no devotees in this province to transfer.
DEV UI - sets factor to +50. so end turn to see it apply!
DEV UI - sets factor to -50. so end turn to see it apply!

coin.componentleveltooltip: This is the amount of income this province generates every turn.

header_frame.componentleveltooltip: Once [[img:icon_growth]][[/img]]growth reaches a certain threshold, [[img:icon_pop_surplus]][[/img]]population surplus is created. This can then be spent on upgrading your settlement building, which will open an additional building slot.||{{tr:click_to_open_hp}}
Any transitory effects that apply to this province will appear here. These may come from various sources including [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero actions and random events.||{{tr:click_to_open_hp}}

label_txt.componentleveltooltip: Collecting the income from a province will provide it with an additional recruitment slot, at the cost of a [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} penalty.

header_income.componentleveltooltip: Factions gain income from buildings in territory they control. Place the mouse cursor over the income value on this panel to see a breakdown of sources.||{{tr:click_to_open_hp}}

header_control.componentleveltooltip: Control in a province is a measure of population happiness or repression, and must be kept in check to prevent the province degenerating into rebellion.||{{tr:click_to_open_hp}}

happy.name: happy
happy.tooltip: Under control||The population is either happy, or too scared of you to do anything!||Although both will keep order in your province, a happy population will increase town growth.

neutral.name: neutral
neutral.tooltip: Neutral||The population are neither unhappy nor completely under your control.||You may wish to take steps to improve your control over them, such as increasing repression.

unhappy.name: unhappy
unhappy.tooltip: Unhappy||The population is unhappy and could easily riot and rebel.||Increase repression in this area to keep things from getting worse.

dy_devotees.componentleveltooltip: [PH] This is the number of devotees in this province

icon_devotees.componentleveltooltip: This is the amount of Devotees

default.name: default
default.text: Transfer all Devotees to a province:
